FLAVOUR_0_HEADLINE.message: NAIDHEACHD {date}: Tha siostam {system} air fad a' fulang fo phlàigh. Tha reat-bhàsan a' meudachadh.

FLAVOUR_0_NEWSBODY.description: Imply high demand for MEDICINE commodity.
FLAVOUR_0_NEWSBODY.message: Tha plàigh ag adhbharachadh bàs ann an siostam {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}). Tha na h-ùghdarrasan a' sireadh cobhair mheadaigeach gu h-èiginneach.

FLAVOUR_10_HEADLINE.message: NEWS {date}: Company threatening continual survival of {system} system.

FLAVOUR_10_NEWSBODY.description: Imply high demand of AIR_PROCESSORS commodity. (Prekall as in Rekall, the fictional company from the Schwarzenegger-movie Total Recall (1990)).
FLAVOUR_10_NEWSBODY.message: Prekall Inc. are seeking to monopolize air itself throughout {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}). Take a deep breath, it might be the last one that is free of charge.

FLAVOUR_11_HEADLINE.message: NEWS {date}: Mysterious disappearance of cattle in the {system} system.

FLAVOUR_11_NEWSBODY.message: As if by a stroke of a higher power, the farmers in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) woke up to empty barns. "It's the cattle theft of the century", police reports.

FLAVOUR_12_HEADLINE.message: NEWS {date}: Infrastructure breakdown as computers malfunction in the {system} system.

FLAVOUR_12_NEWSBODY.description: Keep clear of the too obvious names Microsoft, or Macrosoft, etc.
FLAVOUR_12_NEWSBODY.message: A nasty virus caused all Nachosoft computers in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) to suffer a complete hard drive meltdown. The faulty units make excellent paper weights, computer scientists say.

FLAVOUR_13_HEADLINE.message: NEWS {date}: Robot uprising in the {system} system.

FLAVOUR_13_NEWSBODY.description: Imply that nobody wants to buy ROBOTS anymore.
FLAVOUR_13_NEWSBODY.message: It is now man against machine in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}), as "behavioural malfunction" causes home consumers to loose faith in robot servants.

FLAVOUR_14_HEADLINE.message: NEWS {date}: Solar flare causes biggest black out in a millennium in the {system} system.

FLAVOUR_14_NEWSBODY.description: Avoid using word Tupperware, say tuppenware, blooperware, tooperwar or plastic containers etc. If translation doesn't work, feel free to be creative, as long as it is implying a high demand of PLASTICS.
FLAVOUR_14_NEWSBODY.message: The system wide power outage wrecks havoc to the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}). Consumers line up to buy the last Trapperware to replace their fridges, as producer has run out of raw material.

FLAVOUR_15_HEADLINE.message: NEWS {date}: Police raids crime syndicate in the {system} system, key leaders arrested.

FLAVOUR_15_NEWSBODY.message: The administration in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) hopes crime will diminish as drugs are no longer available, since the arrest of several mobsters.

FLAVOUR_16_HEADLINE.message: NEWS {date}: Serious accident during the annual {system} Great Steam Fair.

FLAVOUR_16_NEWSBODY.message: During the Great Steam Fair in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) an attempt for the galactic record in biggest tractor pulling contest ended in mayhem as one of the contestants lost control of his contraption, destroying all other participants' machines. Administration says it could spell doom for the local farmers.

FLAVOUR_17_HEADLINE.message: NEWS {date}: New found riches in the {system} system.

FLAVOUR_17_NEWSBODY.message: Miners in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) discovered a vast deposit of ore of never before seen proportions.

FLAVOUR_18_HEADLINE.message: NEWS {date}: Economic reform in the {system} system a great success.

FLAVOUR_18_NEWSBODY.message: The wheels are spinning ever faster in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) as consumers have more money to spend.

FLAVOUR_19_HEADLINE.message: NEWS {date}: It is raining gold in the {system} system.

FLAVOUR_19_NEWSBODY.message: A man in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) has inherited an invention from his late uncle, allowing him to transmute any solid into gold and platinum. Economists expect a destabilization of the economy in the system, unless the machine breaks down soon.

FLAVOUR_1_HEADLINE.message: NAIDHEACHD {date}: Tha còmhstri air èirigh ann an siostam {system}.

FLAVOUR_1_NEWSBODY.description: Imply high demand of BATTLE_WEAPONS. I.e. the word combat is important.
FLAVOUR_1_NEWSBODY.message: Tha a' chòmhstri fhada ann an siostam {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) air dol am miosad leis na feachdan ag èirigh gu cath a-nis.

FLAVOUR_20_HEADLINE.message: NEWS {date}: The harvest of the gas giant algae in the {system} system sets new record.

FLAVOUR_20_NEWSBODY.description: Imply vast abundance of FERTILIZER. Soylent is a reference to the book/movie Soylent Green.
FLAVOUR_20_NEWSBODY.message: As {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) enters a phase favourable to the yellow algae found in the atmosphere of a local gas giant, the harvest has be exceptionally good for the fertilizer company Soylent Yellow Inc.

FLAVOUR_21_HEADLINE.message: NEWS {date}: Treaty signed in the {system} system for more "humane" warfare.

FLAVOUR_21_NEWSBODY.message: Although the conflicting parties in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) have not signed an official cease fire, they have agreed to stop using chemical weapons.

FLAVOUR_22_HEADLINE.message: NEWS {date}: Police on strike in the {system} system. Citizens left to fend for themselves.

FLAVOUR_22_NEWSBODY.message: In a protest against understaffing the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) police refuse to work. Meanwhile, civilians form vigilante groups and arm themselves with pitchforks and firearms as they prepare for the worst.

FLAVOUR_23_HEADLINE.message: NEWS {date}: Grand opening of a new factory in the {system} system.

FLAVOUR_23_NEWSBODY.description: Imply high demand of METAL_ALLOYS. Amissionox is a play on words for Victorinox.
FLAVOUR_23_NEWSBODY.message: The new Amissionox factory in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) is now up and running. It will produce high quality knifes capable of cutting through a space boot; however, due to low supply of resources needed for the blades, they have not yet reached full production potential.

FLAVOUR_2_HEADLINE.message: NAIDHEACHD {date}: Tart ann an siostam {system}. Chaidh am barr a mhilleadh.

FLAVOUR_2_NEWSBODY.description: Hint there will be high demand of GRAIN.
FLAVOUR_2_NEWSBODY.message: Tha mòr-thart air a' bharr a mhilleadh ann an siostam {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}). Thathar fo chunnart goirt air feadh an t-siostaim.

FLAVOUR_3_HEADLINE.message: NAIDHEACHD {date}: Fèill mòr air dòigh-beatha an fheòil-sheachnair ann an siostam {system}.

FLAVOUR_3_NEWSBODY.message: Tha an rianachd ann an siostam {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) ag amas barrachd glasraich ion-phortadh gus an t-iarrtas mòr a choileanadh.

FLAVOUR_4_HEADLINE.description: About mob rivals competing for selling drugs
FLAVOUR_4_HEADLINE.message: NAIDHEACHD {date}: Cogadh dhrugaichean ann an siostam {system}. Tha am poileas a' strì gus làmh an uachdair fhaighinn air ais.

FLAVOUR_4_NEWSBODY.message: Tha am margadh ann an siostam {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) air a lìonadh le drugaichean saora fhad 's a tha tighearnan dhrugaichean ann an còmhstri airson an cumhachd a mheudachadh.

FLAVOUR_5_HEADLINE.message: NAIDHEACHD {date}: Aramach nan tràillean ann an siostam {system}. Chaidh stad a chur air gach gnìomhachas àrachais.

FLAVOUR_5_NEWSBODY.message: Shaor an luchd-obrach ann an siostam {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) iad fhèin o na slabhraidhean 's iad a' diùltadh ri obair ann an achaidhean lòtais. Thug seo stad air an eaconamaidh o nach eil luchd-obrach saor ri fhaighinn.

FLAVOUR_6_HEADLINE.description: (Quibble as a derivative of Tribble from Star Trek TOS)
FLAVOUR_6_HEADLINE.message: NAIDHEACHD {date}: Fèille àigheach nan Quibbles ann an siostam {system}.

FLAVOUR_6_NEWSBODY.description: Stress drunken or intoxicated by alcohol, as this will imply high demand of LIQUOR.
FLAVOUR_6_NEWSBODY.message: Tha subhachas raoiteach ann an siostam {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) a' dol air adhart fhathast dhad 's a thathar a' toirt urram air na creutairean beaga clòimheach.

FLAVOUR_7_HEADLINE.message: NAIDHEACHD {date}: Thàinig stad air a' ghnìomhachas ann an siostam {system}.

FLAVOUR_7_NEWSBODY.message: Tha mòr-dhearmad nan innealan ag adhbharachadh stad a' ghnìomhachais ann an siostam {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}).

FLAVOUR_8_HEADLINE.message: NEWS {date}: Mining accident reported from the {system} system.

FLAVOUR_8_NEWSBODY.message: A mine collapsed in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}), killing hundreds of workers and destroying important machinery vital for the economy.

FLAVOUR_9_HEADLINE.message: NEWS {date}: Fashion craze in the {system} system.

FLAVOUR_9_NEWSBODY.description: live pets is important, since it implies high demand of LIVE_ANIMALS commodity.
FLAVOUR_9_NEWSBODY.message: The latest trend in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) has it real live pets are the next big thing.

GRATEFUL_GREETING_0.message: Welcome trader! We will give you a good price for your {cargo}.

GRATEFUL_GREETING_1.message: Your arrival is most welcome, as is your shipment of {cargo}!

GRATEFUL_GREETING_2.message: Greetings and salutations! You should have no trouble selling {cargo} here.

GRATEFUL_GREETING_5.message: Welcome! Your shipment of {cargo} will sell out fast here.
